subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Hedo Turkoglu, Jerry Stackhouse and Shawn Marion were the centerpieces of a four-team trade involving eight players that grew larger as it gained momentum before it was finalized on Thursday.
snippet: Hedo Turkoglu, Jerry Stackhouse and Shawn Marion were the centerpieces of a four-team trade involving eight players that grew larger as it gained momentum before it was finalized on Thursday.
